statements.statement: SELECT TOATHUOC_ID FROM TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC TT WHERE TT.KHAMBENH_ID ='$KHAMBENH_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ( PHIEULINH_ID IS NOT NULL OR CHUNGTU_ID IS NOT NULL)
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC order by TOATHUOC_ID
update TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC set TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'

select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC
TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
SOTHUTUTOA = '$SOTHUTUTOA$'
KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
SONGAY = '$SONGAY$'
SOLANTRENNGAY = '$SOLANTRENNGAY$'
SOLUONGTRENLAN = '$SOLUONGTRENLAN$'
SOLUONG_BUOISANG = '$SOLUONG_BUOISANG$'
SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = '$SOLUONG_BUOITRUA$'
SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = '$SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU$'
SOLUONG_BUOITOI = '$SOLUONG_BUOITOI$'
DUONGDUNG_ID = '$DUONGDUNG_ID$'
GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONDUOC_ID$'
PHIEULINH_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
NGUONLAYTHUOC = '$NGUONLAYTHUOC$'
COSO = '$COSO$'
KHOPHAT_ID = '$KHOPHAT_ID$'
PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = '$PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY$'
MUANGOAI = '$MUANGOAI$'
TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
MIENPHI = '$MIENPHI$'
BHYTDONGTIEN = '$BHYTDONGTIEN$'
KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
HUYTOATHUOC = '$HUYTOATHUOC$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
order by TOATHUOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$value$' order by TOATHUOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$' order by TOATHUOC_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC ( TOATHUOC_ID , SOTHUTUTOA , KHAMBENH_ID , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , DUOC_ID , SOLUONG , SONGAY , SOLANTRENNGAY , SOLUONGTRENLAN , SOLUONG_BUOISANG , SOLUONG_BUOITRUA , SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU , SOLUONG_BUOITOI , DUONGDUNG_ID , GHICHU , NGUONDUOC_ID , PHIEULINH_ID , CHUNGTU_ID , PHONGBANRATOA_ID , NGUONLAYTHUOC , COSO , KHOPHAT_ID , KHOTAO_ID , PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY , MUANGOAI , TINHTIEN , MIENPHI , BHYTDONGTIEN , KHONGTHUTIEN , TRANGTHAI , HUYTOATHUOC , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #ID# , #SOTHUTUTOA# , #KHAMBENH_ID# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #SOLUONG# , #SONGAY# , #SOLANTRENNGAY# , #SOLUONGTRENLAN# , #SOLUONG_BUOISANG# , #SOLUONG_BUOITRUA# , #SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU# , #SOLUONG_BUOITOI# , #DUONGDUNG_ID# , #GHICHU# , #NGUONDUOC_ID# , #PHIEULINH_ID# , #CHUNGTU_ID# , #PHONGBANRATOA_ID# , #NGUONLAYTHUOC# , #COSO# , #KHOPHAT_ID# , #KHOTAO_ID# , #PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY# , #MUANGOAI# , #TINHTIEN# , #MIENPHI# , #BHYTDONGTIEN# , #KHONGTHUTIEN# , #TRANGTHAI# , #HUYTOATHUOC# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC set KHAMBENH_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID# , TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , SONGAY = #SONGAY# , SOLANTRENNGAY = #SOLANTRENNGAY# , SOLUONGTRENLAN = #SOLUONGTRENLAN# , SOLUONG_BUOISANG = #SOLUONG_BUOISANG# , SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = #SOLUONG_BUOITRUA# , SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = #SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU# , SOLUONG_BUOITOI = #SOLUONG_BUOITOI# , DUONGDUNG_ID = #DUONGDUNG_ID# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , NGUONDUOC_ID = #NGUONDUOC_ID# , PHIEULINH_ID = #PHIEULINH_ID# , CHUNGTU_ID = #CHUNGTU_ID# , PHONGBANRATOA_ID = #PHONGBANRATOA_ID# , NGUONLAYTHUOC = #NGUONLAYTHUOC# , COSO = #COSO# , KHOPHAT_ID = #KHOPHAT_ID# , PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = #PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY# , MUANGOAI = #MUANGOAI# , TINHTIEN = #TINHTIEN# , MIENPHI = #MIENPHI# , BHYTDONGTIEN = #BHYTDONGTIEN# , KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , HUYTOATHUOC = #HUYTOATHUOC# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
Select * from TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
Select TOATHUOC_ID, DUOC_ID, KHOPHAT_ID, SOLUONG, KHAMBENH_ID, BENHVIEN_ID from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'

delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC
TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'
SOTHUTUTOA = '$SOTHUTUTOA$'
KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
SONGAY = '$SONGAY$'
SOLANTRENNGAY = '$SOLANTRENNGAY$'
SOLUONGTRENLAN = '$SOLUONGTRENLAN$'
SOLUONG_BUOISANG = '$SOLUONG_BUOISANG$'
SOLUONG_BUOITRUA = '$SOLUONG_BUOITRUA$'
SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU = '$SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU$'
SOLUONG_BUOITOI = '$SOLUONG_BUOITOI$'
DUONGDUNG_ID = '$DUONGDUNG_ID$'
GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
NGUONDUOC_ID = '$NGUONDUOC_ID$'
PHIEULINH_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
NGUONLAYTHUOC = '$NGUONLAYTHUOC$'
COSO = '$COSO$'
KHOPHAT_ID = '$KHOPHAT_ID$'
PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY = '$PHATTHUOCTAIQUAY$'
MUANGOAI = '$MUANGOAI$'
TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
MIENPHI = '$MIENPHI$'
BHYTDONGTIEN = '$BHYTDONGTIEN$'
KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
HUYTOATHUOC = '$HUYTOATHUOC$'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
select * from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' and REF_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$' and REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
statements.insert: insert into TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU ( REF_TABLE , REF_ID , KHODUOC_ID , DUOC_ID , CHUYENKHOA_ID , NGUONHANG_ID , BENHVIEN_ID , SOLUONG , NGAYHIEULUC , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #REF_TABLE# , #TOATHUOC_ID# , #KHODUOC_ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #CHUYENKHOA_ID# , #NGUONHANG_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #SOLUONG# , #NGAYHIEULUC# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU set SOLUONG = #SOLUONG#, DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID#, NGAYHIEULUC = #NGAYHIEULUC#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where BOOKING_ID = '$BOOKING_ID$'
statements.delete: delete from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_ID = #TOATHUOC_ID# and REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE# and DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# and BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
statements.update: update TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU set SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# where KHODUOC_ID = '$KHODUOC_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and NGAYHIEULUC = '$NGAYHIEULUC$'
statements.statement: select sum(SOLUONG) as SOLUONG from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$' and DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
select CHUNGTU_ID, PHIEULINH_ID, HUYTOATHUOC, NGUOITAO_ID from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where TOATHUOC_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$'

delete from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#

delete from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#

select * from TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NOITRU where REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE#
#LSTTOATHUOC_ID[]#
select a.*, b.SOLUONG as SOLUONGTAMNGUNG from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC a left join TT_NOITRU_TRATHUOC_CHITIET b on a.TOATHUOC_ID = b.TOATHUOC_ID where a.KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
select MACHUNGTU as SOPHIEULINH from TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH where CHUNGTU_ID = '$PHIEULINH_ID$'
select MACHUNGTU as SOCHUNGTU from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU where CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
select * from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU where CHUNGTU_ID in (select CHUNGTU_ID from TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET where TOATHUOCNOITRU_ID = '$TOATHUOC_ID$') and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select DUOC_ID, SOLUONG, NGAYTAO, SONGAY from TT_NOITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID in (select KHAMBENH_ID from TT_NOITRU_KHAMBENH where TIEPNHAN_ID in (select TIEPNHAN_ID from TT_TIEPNHAN where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$')) and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TRUNC(NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
union
select DUOC_ID, SOLUONG, NGAYTAO, SONGAY from TT_NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC where KHAMBENH_ID in (select KHAMBENH_ID from TT_NGOAITRU_KHAMBENH where TIEPNHAN_ID in (select TIEPNHAN_ID from TT_TIEPNHAN where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$')) and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TRUNC(NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
order by NGAYTAO
